nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
Based on openzeppelin tag v1.10.0 commit: feb665136c0dae9912e08397c1a21c4af3651ef3
Modifications:
1) Added pauser role, switched pause/unpause to be onlyPauser (6/14/2018)
2) Removed whenNotPause/whenPaused from pause/unpause (6/14/2018)
3) Removed whenPaused (6/14/2018)
4) Switches ownable library to use zeppelinos (7/12/18)
5) Remove constructor (7/13/18)
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev throws if called by any account other than the pauser
nodes.name: onlyPauser

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation: @dev update the pauser role
nodes.name: updatePauser

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
Based on openzeppelin tag v1.10.0 commit: feb665136c0dae9912e08397c1a21c4af3651ef3
Modifications:
1) Added pauser role, switched pause/unpause to be onlyPauser (6/14/2018)
2) Removed whenNotPause/whenPaused from pause/unpause (6/14/2018)
3) Removed whenPaused (6/14/2018)
4) Switches ownable library to use zeppelinos (7/12/18)
5) Remove constructor (7/13/18)

allowance(address,address).details: Get allowed amount for an account

approve(address,uint256).return: True if the operation was successful.

balanceOf(address).details: Get token balance of an account

burn(uint256).details: allows a minter to burn some of its own tokens Validates that caller is a minter and that sender is not blacklisted amount is less than or equal to the minter's account balance

params._amount: uint256 the amount of tokens to be burned

configureMinter(address,uint256).details: Function to add/update a new minter

params.minterAllowedAmount: The minting amount allowed for the minter

configureMinter(address,uint256).return: True if the operation was successful.

isMinter(address).details: Checks if account is a minter

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint. Must be less than or equal to the minterAllowance of the caller.
params._to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.

mint(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

minterAllowance(address).details: Get minter allowance for an account

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

params.minter: The address of the minter to remove

removeMinter(address).return: True if the operation was successful.

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer token for a specified address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another.

params._from: address The address which you want to send tokens from
params._to: address The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: uint256 the amount of tokens to be transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params._account: The address to remove from the blacklist

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
